column2: Transfer a state or colonial region to another country with no effect on infamy, prestige, or jingoism and without a truce at the end
Transfer a substate with no effect on infamy, prestige, or jingoism and with a 1 month truce at the end
Release a puppet with no effect on infamy, prestige, or jingoism and with a 1 month truce at the end
Annex a country of small size and population by conquest
Force a country to remove their tariffs.
Force access through a non-GP, at the cost of their prestige. §YNOTE: do not peace out, the war is the access.§!
Fully annex an independent nation. §YNOTE: Will cost 25 infamy when used§!.
Start a war without justification. §YNOTE: Will cost 12 infamy when used.§!
Annex a state with Indian culture or a cultural core
Take a §Ypuppet§W from a third country and make it our puppet.
Liberate and puppet an §Yentire country§W from its oppressors\n\n§YNOTE: §RDo not use it with normal Free people or Liberate Country CBs for other non existent countries.§!
Start a war with a puppetmaster to allow wargoals to be added on their puppet(s)
Establish a republic on a non-republican bordering nation. \n\n§YNOTE: Will cost 7 infamy when used.§!
Prevent the offending nation from levying tolls across the Mediterranean Strait
Conquer and transfer an enemy §Ycolonial state§! to an ally
Acquire colony $STATE$ from $RECIPIENT$ and transfer to an ally
Conquer and transfer an enemy §Ystate§! to an ally
Acquire $STATE$ from $RECIPIENT$ and transfer to an ally
Conquer and transfer an enemy §Ycapital§! to an ally
Acquire capital $STATE$ from $RECIPIENT$ and transfer to an ally
Transfer a state or colonial region from the 1st country to the 2nd country with no effect on infamy, prestige, or jingoism and without a truce at the end
